entry.def: A retrospective is an exhibition or showing of work done by an artist over many years, rather than his or her most recent work.

example.ex: ...a retrospective of the films of Judy Garland...
They honoured him with a retrospective exhibition in 1987.
example.tran: 他们在1987年为他举办了一次回顾展，以示敬意。

entry.def: Retrospective feelings or opinions concern things that happened in the past.

example.ex: Afterwards, retrospective fear of the responsibility would make her feel almost faint.
example.tran: 后来，回想起要负的责任她几乎会吓晕过去。

entry.tran: (法律、法律行为等)有追溯效力的
entry.def: Retrospective laws or legal actions take effect from a date before the date when they are officially approved.

example.ex: Bankers are quick to condemn retrospective tax legislation.
example.tran: 银行家们立即声讨有追溯效力的税收立法。

means.word_mean: 1. an exhibition of a representative selection of an artist's life work
1. concerned with or related to the past;

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划

re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

sentences.en: A retrospective influence pervaded the whole performance.
sentences.cn: 怀旧的影响弥漫了整个演出。
